patthana9.2:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.2:1.1_1: Nahetuṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.2:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.2:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
